column1: echo ¦sed¦-i '/on SOLR index .*/ s/.*/ echo "Indexing $CRAWL_ID on Elasticsearch Node -> $ESNODE"\\n $bin\\/nutch elasticindex $commonOptions $ESNODE -all -crawlId $CRAWL_ID\\n\\n\\n&/' $NUTCH_HOME/bin/crawl :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦sed¦-i '/^if[ "$SOLRURL".*/ s/.*/if[ "$ESNODE" = ""]; then\\n echo "Missing Elasticsearch Node Name : crawl <seedDir> <crawlID> <esNODE> <numberOfRounds>"\\n exit -1;\\nfi\\n\\n\\n&/' $NUTCH_HOME/bin/crawl :: Filesystem_operation
